data.title: Adani, Enugu State, Nigeria
data.text:
Adani is a town located in Enugu State, Nigeria, at latitude 6.7349400 and longitude 7.0157000. It is known for its rich history and heritage, with evidence of early settlement dating back to the 17th century. The weather in Adani is characterized by a tropical climate with distinct wet and dry seasons.
